author: Jon Costantino
title: Rep. Matt Gaetz: We Should Pass Legislation So Americans Can Sue China For Damages
description: On Fox Across America with Jimmy Failla, Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) explains why he agrees with Rep. Dan Crenshaw (R-TX) wanting to pass legislation to let Americans sue the Chinese government in the aftermath of COVID-19. "Here's what every American should ask t…
content:
On Fox Across America with Jimmy Failla, Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) explains why he agrees with Rep. Dan Crenshaw (R-TX) wanting to pass legislation to let Americans sue the Chinese government in the aftermath of COVID-19. 
"Here's what every American should ask… [+851 chars]
